thread.title: TT Franks
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by TT Franks

author: TT Franks
title: TT Franks
text: I bought a lot of dive equipment online due to time constraints and not being able to get to the warehouse. Mike's had a great selection of gear and when something I wanted wasn't available they furnished me with a great alternative and made sure it was shipped quickly, too. Friendly and helpful over the phone and delivery was extremely fast. I would reccommend Mike's entirely - thanks.
